rationale: Data Redaction requires a license for Oracle Advanced Security to use.
recommended_action: Make sure there are no Data Redaction policies created.  To drop a Data Redaction Policy: https://docs.oracle.com/cd/E11882_01/network.112/e40393/redaction_config.htm#ASOAG744
error_message: Data Redaction is listed as a feature usage concern under Oracle Advanced Security
